text:
@SenatorLoeffler @SenateGOP Like you played the #market?
Here's an idea @SenatorLoeffler , why don't you pay $3million to all the out of work Georgians who lost their jobs due to #COVID19 or pay for the medical equipment that Georgia health care facilities need.
